item.title: About
item.description:
Magical trees, take me home. /about/ -

Hi there

My name is Magicwenli, a 26-year-old software engineer.

I like to code, and I am currently learning how to code. Come to see my work!

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Magical trees, take me home. /posts/hello/ -

辗转反复多次，最后终于意识到比写博客有意思的是折腾博客。

下次记得留下一些被打败的凹痕，以作纪念。 - 蕾欧娜

console.log("Hello World");
- /posts/hello/ -
